Text:

This compilation is the complete Season 1 series. Enjoy and enjoy and seed and seed.......

yeah but it will also be broadcast on BBC one (PDTV rather than DSR from bbca) and probably from BBC HD as well which annihilates hdnets quality thus making much better 720p encodes and probably better 350mb HDTV rips weeks earlier
in other words you don't have to worry about (or even record) USA rips as the UK ones are what count
